skills.name: fortalece-api-routing-guide
skills.description: Select the correct Fortalece API operation for a PM intent using deterministic route evidence, runtime auth probes, and strict mutation gating.
skills.short_description: Select Fortalece API operations with V2 safety
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide to classify PM intent and return routing_decisions_v2 plus mutation_gate_v2. Enforce canonical /api/story-map/** policy, run runtime auth probe with x-workspace-id, and block mutations when route/auth/scope evidence is unresolved.

skills.name: pm-intake-normalizer
skills.description: Normalize vague product requests into a strict V2 PM brief with explicit assumptions, non-goals, route evidence, and mutation gating.
skills.short_description: Convert vague asks into V2 PM briefs
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-intake-normalizer. Return strict V2 outputs with route_evidence_v2 and mutation_gate_v2, including assumptions, non_goals, and explicit blockers when mutations are unsafe.

skills.name: pm-backlog-health-auditor
skills.description: Audit backlog quality for duplicates, weak acceptance criteria, orphaned hierarchy links, and drift with strict V2 route evidence and mutation gating.
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-backlog-health-auditor to analyze backlog quality and include route evidence (operation, family, auth_mode, why).

skills.name: pm-story-splitter
skills.description: Decompose large epics/features into thin vertical stories with strict V2 contracts, dependency DAG validation, and mutation payload blueprints.
skills.short_description: Split large scope into V2 thin stories
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-story-splitter. Return strict V2 outputs with route_evidence_v2 and mutation_gate_v2, plus dependency_dag, mutation_payload_blueprint, and deterministic idempotency keys per story.

skills.name: pm-hybrid-prioritizer
skills.description: Rank backlog items with a hybrid PM score and deterministic ordering, with V2 route evidence and mutation gating.
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-hybrid-prioritizer to score backlog items and include route evidence (operation, family, auth_mode, why).

skills.name: pm-dependency-risk-mapper
skills.description: Identify dependency/blocker chains, quantify risk clusters, and produce dependency update plans with V2 route evidence and mutation gating.
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-dependency-risk-mapper to map dependency/blocker chains and include route evidence (operation, family, auth_mode, why).

skills.name: pm-release-capacity-planner
skills.description: Allocate prioritized stories into releases/sprints using capacity constraints with V2 route evidence and mutation gating.
skills.short_description: Plan releases by capacity and risk
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-release-capacity-planner to allocate ranked stories into releases and include route evidence (operation, family, auth_mode, why).

skills.name: pm-feedback-triage-router
skills.description: Convert validated product feedback into backlog-ready stories mapped to feature/release/priority context with V2 route evidence and mutation gating.
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-feedback-triage-router to triage feedback into mapped backlog stories and include route evidence (operation, family, auth_mode, why).

skills.name: pm-backlog-autopilot
skills.description: Execute deterministic backlog organization in strict V2 batches with dry-run first, rollback notes, and mutation gating.
skills.short_description: Auto-organize backlog in V2 safe batches
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-backlog-autopilot. Return strict V2 outputs with route_evidence_v2 and mutation_gate_v2, mandatory dry_run_plan, bounded mutation_batches, and route_evidence_id on applied/failed changes.

skills.name: pm-roadmap-status-reporter
skills.description: Produce stakeholder-ready roadmap updates with progress and risk visibility, including V2 route evidence and mutation gating context.
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-roadmap-status-reporter to generate a roadmap report and include route evidence (operation, family, auth_mode, why).

skills.name: pm-backlog-drift-monitor
skills.description: Monitor backlog drift against prioritization/dependency policy and apply corrective alignment with V2 route evidence and mutation gating.
skills.default_prompt: Use $fortalece-api-routing-guide first, then $pm-backlog-drift-monitor to detect/correct backlog drift and include route evidence (operation, family, auth_mode, why).
